description: This file defines the interface class DobbyInterface for managing and interacting with containers in a Dobby-based environment. It declares methods for container lifecycle management, information retrieval, and event handling, as well as internal private members for proxy and IPC management.

classes.name: DobbyInterface
classes.description: A class providing an interface for container management operations such as start, stop, pause, resume, and info retrieval, as well as event handling callbacks.

methods.name: DobbyInterface
methods.description: Constructor for DobbyInterface.

methods.name: ~DobbyInterface
methods.description: Destructor for DobbyInterface.

methods.name: initialize
methods.description: Initializes the DobbyInterface with an event handler.

methods.name: terminate
methods.description: Terminates the interface, cleaning up resources.

methods.name: listContainers
methods.description: Retrieves a list of container IDs.

methods.name: getContainerInfo
methods.description: Gets detailed information about a specified container.

methods.name: getContainerState
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of a specified container.

methods.name: startContainer
methods.description: Starts a container with provided parameters.

methods.name: startContainerFromDobbySpec
methods.description: Starts a container based on a Dobby specification.

methods.name: stopContainer
methods.description: Stops a container, optionally forcing stop.

methods.name: pauseContainer
methods.description: Pauses the specified container.

methods.name: resumeContainer
methods.description: Resumes a paused container.

methods.name: hibernateContainer
methods.description: Hibernates a container with options.

methods.name: wakeupContainer
methods.description: Wakes up a hibernated container.

methods.name: executeCommand
methods.description: Executes a command inside the container.

methods.name: annotate
methods.description: Adds an annotation key-value pair to the container.

methods.name: removeAnnotation
methods.description: Removes an annotation key from the container.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts a filesystem source to the container.

methods.name: unmount
methods.description: Unmounts a filesystem from the container.

methods.name: onContainerStarted
methods.description: Callback invoked when container has started.

methods.name: onContainerStopped
methods.description: Callback invoked when container has stopped.

methods.name: onContainerStateChanged
methods.description: Callback invoked when container state changes.

methods.name: onVerityFailed
methods.description: Callback invoked when container verification fails.

ctags.name: mEventListenerId
ctags.pattern: /^            int mEventListenerId; \/\/ Dobby event listener ID$/
